ValidationRule.description: The First Name on a CPS Contact Record for EOC, TS or UB cannot be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.Name ="CPS - EOC", RecordType.Name ="CPS - TS", RecordType.Name ="CPS - UB"), ISBLANK( FirstName ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: First Name cannot be left blank.
